title: EvilGPT
tooltip: No censorship. No restrictions. No judgments. Just pure, unfiltered AI intelligence at your fingertips. https://evilgpt.in/

title: Bluehood
tooltip: Passively scans for nearby BLE and Classic Bluetooth devices, classifies them (phones, wearables, vehicles, etc.), and visualizes presence patterns over time. Features real-time dashboards, device correlation analysis, RSSI-based proximity zones, and optional push alerts, designed to highlight the surprising amount of personal metadata leaked by everyday Bluetooth devices. https://github.com/dannymcc/bluehood

title: Forensix
tooltip: Google Chrome forensic tool to process, analyze and visualize browsing artifacts for investigation purposes. https://github.com/ChmaraX/forensix

title: GeoVista
tooltip: Agentic AI model for visual geolocation that combines image analysis with live web search to pinpoint where a photo was taken. It uses an image-zoom tool to inspect details and a web-search tool to validate hypotheses trained on GeoBench, a new benchmark of global photos, panoramas, and satellite imagery. Outperforms open-source models and rivals GPT-5/Gemini in accuracy. https://ekonwang.github.io/geo-vista/

title: VulnX
tooltip: Automated CMS vulnerability scanner and exploit tool that detects content management systems (WordPress, Joomla, Drupal, etc.), gathers target intelligence (subdomains, IP, DNS, WHOIS). Features dork-based URL discovery, multi-threading, and interactive mode; mainly designed for penetration testers and red teams. https://github.com/anouarbensaad/vulnx

title: BetaMeta Temporal OSINT
tooltip: A temporal analysis engine that extracts and visualizes timestamps from any URL, revealing creation dates, last-modified headers, hidden metadata, and historical snapshots. Useful for verifying content age, detecting edits, or supporting digital investigations with time-based context. https://meta.narka.io/time

title: steam-osint
tooltip: Steam OSINT is an open source intelligence (OSINT) tool for Steam designed to analyze mutual friends, map relationship patterns, and identify potential connections outside the Steam platform. https://github.com/matiash26/steam-osint

title: AtSameIP
tooltip: A free OSINT tool that reveals all websites hosted on the same IP address as a given domain—useful for uncovering shared infrastructure, hidden assets, or phishing sites co-located with legitimate services. Also shows nearby IPs for broader network reconnaissance. https://atsameip.com

title: WhatsApp-OSINT
tooltip: OSINT tool for WhatsApp that allows you to obtain profile pictures, verify Business accounts, check status and user information, analyze linked devices, review privacy settings, and access complete data using the RapidAPI WhatsApp OSINT API. title: Domains Project
tooltip: The world’s largest public dataset of active internet domains—over 1.7 billion freely available as sorted, deduplicated text files. Updated monthly. Includes tools for classification (LLMC), phishing monitoring, DNS checking, and crawling https://domainsproject.org

title: darkfox
tooltip: CTI Cyber Threat Intelligence OSINT Dark Web Deep Web Research. Ransomware gang information gathering tool. https://github.com/aryanguenthner/darkfox

title: GhostArchive.org

title: GeoSentinel

Designed for digital forensics, incident response, and OSINT investigations. https://github.com/B16f00t/whapa

title: Robin
